mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product ( product_name, product_image, category, cost_price, retail_price, stock, description, product_code, discount_rate, shipping_fee, product_status, color, size) values( #{productName}, #{productImage}, #{category}, #{costPrice}, #{retailPrice}, #{stock}, #{description}, #{productCode}, #{discountRate}, #{shippingFee}, #{productStatus}, #{color}, #{size} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_product where product_status = 'AVAILABLE' and product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: update tbl_product set product_name = #{productName}, product_image = #{productImage}, category = #{category}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, retail_price = #{retailPrice}, stock = #{stock}, description = #{description}, product_code = #{productCode}, discount_rate = #{discountRate}, shipping_fee = #{shippingFee}, product_status = #{productStatus}, color = #{color}, size = #{size} where product_id = #{productId}
